readable.title: 488356951_b3b77ad832
readable.content: A man with red shirt and black hat stares at another man . Asian man in red flowered shirt and hat in discussion with two other men Talk between man in Hawaiian shirt , older man in gray and man seen from behind . These three men are sitting near each other , and are all wearing short sleeved shirts . Three men , one in a red and white shirt , are sitting together .
